<!--title-->
# These standing character assets are specifically designed to depict a variety of professions that are commonly seen in royal fantasy RPGs.
<!--text-->
This asset is a product for "RPG Maker Unite".
These standing character assets are specifically designed to depict a variety of professions that are commonly seen in royal fantasy RPGs, but they are not limited to these specific professions and can be used in a variety of other contexts as well!

There are 9 different professions x 2 (male and female) for a total of 18 characters, with 16 different basic expressions.
In addition to the standing character assets, this set also includes walking graphics, side-view graphics, and enemy graphics, providing you with the possibility of creating a stunning RPG using just this set!
*******************************************
Contents
Pictures: 1,088 (each character x 16 facial expressions x weapon variations x size variations)
Characters: 90 (4 directions for each character + K.O. variations)
Faces: 288 (each character x 16 expressions)
Enemy: 36 (each character x 1 type x 2 size variations)
SV_Actors: 324 (each character x 18 motions)
System: 20 (SV weapons x 20 types)
*******************************************
The graphics are available in two sizes, large and small. Please use the size that best suits your taste.
There is also a weapon/weapon-less variations, so you can use both depending on the situation.
(However, only the fighter does not have a weapon holding variation)

Additionally, full-sized PSD data separated by expression parts (eyebrows/eyes/mouth/others) are also included, allowing you to freely combine parts to create expressions beyond the basic materials. If you only want to create a face graphic, there are also resized data available for your convenience.
*******************************************
OPTPiX SpriteStudio is used to create the animation of Characters and SV_Actors.
